price: Yã bãyiNa, waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Lalle fa ƙasãTa mai yalwã* ce, sabãda haka ku bauta Mini.
arabic: يَٰعِبَادِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِنَّ أَرۡضِي وَٰسِعَةٞ فَإِيَّٰيَ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
footnotes: * Tun da ƙasa nã da yalwã, sai mutum ya yi hijira zuwa wurin da yake mai sauƙi a gareshi, ya bauta wa Allah da sauƙi, idan garinsu ya buwãye shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāʿibādiya alladhīna āmanū inna arḍī wāsiʿatun fa-iyyāya fa-uʿ'budūni
